from notebookutils import mssparkutils
storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

path_to_target = "abfss://odw-config@"+storage_account+"standardised_table_definitions/"

# array of file names with corresponding sheet name
files_with_specific_sheets = [{"filename": "Specialist_TPO.xlsx", "sheet": "MiPINS-SQL"},{"filename": "Specialist_Hedgerow", "sheet": "MiPINS-SQL"},{"filename": "Specialist_HH", "sheet": "MiPINS-SQL"}]

import pandas as pd
import json
import re

jobId = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()

mount_storage(path=path_to_source)
mount_storage(path=path_to_target)

file = mssparkutils.fs.ls(path_to_source)

for fi in file:

    if specific_file != '' and specific_file != fi.name:
        continue

    f = fi.path
    print(f)
    if '.csv' in f:
        ext = '.csv'
        filename = f.split("/")[-1]
        df = pd.read_csv(f"/synfs/{jobId}/source/{filename}", quotechar='"',escapechar='\\',encoding="utf8",dtype=str)
    elif '.xlsx' in f:
        ext = '.xlsx'
        filename = f.split("/")[-1]
        file_with_specific_sheet = next(filter(lambda fs: fs['filename'] in filename, files_with_specific_sheets), None)
        sheet_name = file_with_specific_sheet['sheet'] if file_with_specific_sheet else 0
        df = pd.read_excel(f"/synfs/{jobId}/source/{filename}", dtype=str, sheet_name=sheet_name)
    elif '.json' in f:
        ext = '.json'
        filename = f.split("/")[-1]
        df = pd.read_json(f"/synfs/{jobId}/source/{filename}", encoding="utf8", dtype=str)    
    else:
        continue
    df = df.loc[:, ~df.columns.str.contains('^Unnamed')]
    cols_orig = list(df.columns)
    cols=[re.sub('[^0-9a-zA-Z]+', '_', i).lower() for i in cols_orig]
    cols=[colm.rstrip('_') for colm in cols]
    newlist = []
    for i, v in enumerate(cols):
        totalcount = cols.count(v)
        count = cols[:i].count(v)
        newlist.append(v + str(count + 1) if totalcount > 1 else v)

    jsonex = {"fields":[
            {
            "metadata": {},
            "name": "ingested_datetime",
            "type": "timestamp",
            "nullable": False
            },
            {
            "metadata": {},
            "name": "expected_from",
            "type": "timestamp",
            "nullable": False
            },
            {
            "metadata": {},
            "name": "expected_to",
            "type": "timestamp",
            "nullable": False
            }]}
    for col in newlist:
        obj = {
            "metadata": {},
            "name": col,
            "type": "string",
            "nullable": True
            }
        jsonex['fields'].append(obj)

    filename_no_ext = f.split("/")[-1].split(ext)[0]
    json_to_write = json.dumps(jsonex)
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(f)

    f = open(f"/synfs/{jobId}/target/{filename_no_ext}.json", "w")
    f.write(json_to_write)
    f.close()
